title: how to get a hold of someone to get phone repaired
content:
Have been trying to contact google for a warranty issue:
pixel 3xl randomly shuts off and needs to hold volume and power to restart

called and they said put it into "safe mode"

Still happened and am unable to get a hold of anyone via chat or phone. 

Would like to send phone in for replacement
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
